channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This super-cheap Anker power bank is the biggest bargain of the Black Friday sales
item.description: The Anker PowerCore 10K drops to a super-cheap price for Black Friday on Amazon

item.title: OpenAI corrige enfin le plus gros défaut du mode vocal de ChatGPT
item.description: Vous avez déjà essayé de demander à ChatGPT de commenter une image en mode vocal ? C'était impossible sans jongler entre les écrans. Ce temps-là est révolu. OpenAI déploie une mise à jour qui fusionne enfin le chat textuel et l'expérience vocale.

item.title: PC portable avec RTX 5070 et écran 240 Hz : pourquoi ce deal Fnac nous fait hésiter
item.description: C'est la bataille du jour. Face à la promo d'Amazon, la Fnac réplique avec ce MSI Crosshair 16. Même prix, même carte graphique, mais une dalle qui met une claque à la concurrence

item.title: AirPods 4 just got a double Black Friday discount – now nearly half price!
item.description: This is a jaw-droppingly good Black Friday AirPods deal – another $10 cheaper than the previous best

item.title: DeepSeek took off as an AI superstar a year ago - but could it also be a major security risk? These experts think so
item.description: DeepSeek-R1’s code output becomes insecure when political topics are included, revealing hidden censorship and serious risks for enterprise deployments.

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb aurait bien découvert un trou noir géant seulement 350 millions d'années après le Big Bang !
item.description: La galaxie Glass-z12 avait déjà été découverte en 2022 et les observations laissaient penser qu'on la voyait seulement 350 à 400 millions d'années après le Big Bang. Après plusieurs années d'études, il semble maintenant qu'elle contient le plus lointain trou noir géant découvert à ce jour, ce...

item.title: The Best Deals from Huckberry's 2025 Black Friday Sale
item.description: Huckberry’s Black Friday sale features deals on an eclectic curation of travel clothing, coffee gear, and lock pick training kits (seriously).

item.title: ChatGPT’s voice mode is no longer a separate interface
item.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.

item.title: You can grab two months of Paramount Plus with Showtime for $2.99 a month
item.description: In case you missed it, Paramount Plus is raising prices by $1 a month starting on January 15th, 2026, taking the ad-supported Essential plan from $7.99 to $8.99 and the ad-free Premium plan from $12.99 to $13.99. Thankfully, Paramount’s Black Friday promo has arrived just in time to (somewhat) soften the blow. Now through December […]

item.title: We Just Got a Tiny New Look at ‘Star Wars: Starfighter’
item.description: A new ship from the Ryan Gosling-led 2027 'Star Wars' movie has, partially, been revealed.

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on HBO Max, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: I Love LA, The Seduction, and It: Welcome to Derry are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: The best Paramount+ Black Friday deal is here, and it could be its final discount before 2026’s price hike hits
item.description: Paramount+ is offering a deep discount for Black Friday.

item.title: Why shoppers may spend less this holiday week—even with more deals
item.description: Deloitte’s survey shows a 4% pullback driven by financial pressure, with Gen X and Boomers slashing budgets the most. If everything feels expensive this year, you’re not alone. The high cost of living is on many Americans’ minds heading into the tail end of the year – a period defined by ceaseless shopping, whether it’s for the Thanksgiving menu or a last minute gift for under the tree....

item.title: Retail sales rose slightly in September as Americans pulled back on spending
item.description: Sales rose 0.2% in September from the previous month, the Commerce Department said Tuesday. Sales at U.S. retailers and restaurants increased modestly in September as resilient consumers moderated their spending after splurging over the summer.

item.title: Oubliez les apirateurs robots à 800 € : l’Ecovacs T50 Pro Omni devient l’affaire du jour
item.description: C'est simple : trouver une station de lavage à eau chaude et un robot avec caméra IA sous les 400 euros, c'était impossible hier. Aujourd'hui, avec ce code promo, ça devient la réalité du marché.

item.title: Warner Music signs deal with AI music startup Suno, settles lawsuit
item.description: WMG says artists and songwriters will have full control over whether and how their names, images, likenesses, voices, and compositions are used in new AI-generated music.

item.title: ICE Offers Up to $280 Million to Immigrant-Tracking ‘Bounty Hunter’ Firms
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement lifted a $180 million cap on a proposed immigrant-tracking program while guaranteeing multimillion-dollar payouts for private surveillance firms.

item.title: The 101 best Amazon Black Friday tech deals vetted by our experts – AirPods, TVs, Kindle, and more
item.description: Amazon's Black Friday sale is live, and I've found the 101 best tech deals vetted by our experts, featuring record-low prices on AirPods, TVs, Kindle, and more.

item.title: Trump Questions Whether Turkeys He Pardoned Are Really MAHA Because They’re ‘Fat’
item.description: "Secretary Kennedy has formally certified that these are the first ever MAHA turkeys," said Trump.

item.title: Just when I thought Apple TV had the best Black Friday streaming deal, Disney Plus comes along with 30% off its 12-month subscription
item.description: With some excellent Black Friday streaming deals already hitting the market, this Disney Plus offer might be the best of the bunch – breaking down to less than ten bucks a month.

item.title: Black Friday Brings a Truly Great iPad Deal
item.description: Bolstered by Apple’s iPadOS 26 update, this discounted tablet is more versatile than ever before.

item.title: OpenAI and Perplexity are launching AI shopping assistants, but competing startups aren’t sweating it
item.description: Startup founders building AI shopping tools think general-purpose models are too broad to deliver truly personalized shopping experiences.

item.title: C’est le PC portable gamer le plus équilibré et le moins cher qu’on ait vu aujourd’hui
item.description: C'est rare de voir une RTX 5070 passer sous la barre des 1300 euros aussi vite. Amazon dégaine une offre Black Friday qui risque de faire très mal à la concurrence.

item.title: Hackers impersonate TechCrunch reporters to steal sensitive information - but you can always trust us
item.description: Scammers impersonate TechCrunch employees to steal sensitive data, requiring verification and security measures.

item.title: These are my favorite Switch 2 accessories
item.description: The Switch 2 can be enjoyed right out of the box, but it’s even better with the right accessories. Some of these add-ons are more crucial than others, especially if you’re deciding what to buy early on. For example, a case and a screen protector can keep your console safe from scuffs, scratches, and drops, […]

item.title: Why so many brands want to piss you off
item.description: Nucleus IVF testing, Friend AI, American Eagle: We’re in a ‘quiet part out loud’ era, and guess what? It’s working. If you ask New Yorkers on the street what they think about the giant, controversial print ad campaign in the NYC subway system, their initial response might be, “Which one?” In the past two months alone, not one, but two ad campaigns fitting that description have appeared on the subway. ...

item.title: Perplexity says its AI personal shopper ‘puts you first’
item.description: Perplexity is ramping up its AI shopping experience going into the holiday season, just like OpenAI and Google, with a free AI-powered shopping feature that is available now to US users. Its AI assistant looks similar to what we’ve seen from ChatGPT’s shopping research, as users type in what they’re looking for and refine the […]

item.title: Consumer confidence falls to lowest level since April as Americans worry about inflation and jobs
item.description: The Conference Board said Tuesday that its consumer confidence index dropped to 88.7 in November from an upwardly revised October reading of 95.5. U.S. consumers were much less confident in the economy in November in the aftermath of the government shutdown, weak hiring, and stubborn inflation.

item.title: Sam Altman describes OpenAI’s planned AI device in vibes
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman shared some information about the "vibe" the company has in mind for its AI device.

item.title: NASA’s $4.5 Billion Starliner Deal With Boeing Cut to Just 4 Flights After Embarrassing Failures
item.description: The capsule will fly a cargo mission to the ISS early next year, with no crew on board this time.

item.title: AI Teddy Bear That Talked Fetishes and Knives Is Back on the Market
item.description: The toymakers say they've worked out the kinks (literally) and the bear is safe to use again.

item.title: Exclusive: Inside Disney’s most high-tech light parade ever
item.description: TechRadar went behind the scenes with Disney’s parade team to reveal how the magic — and engineering — powers Disney Starlight: Dream the Night Away each night, Magic Kingdom’s first new nighttime parade in years, with ten floats carrying more than half a million LEDs.

item.title: ‘Tron’ Just Can’t Stop Dying
item.description: After the disappointing release of 'Tron: Ares,' a new Hasbro toy set will not be happening either.

item.title: Attorneys general are fighting for states’ rights to regulate AI
item.description: Letitia James, the attorney general of New York, is leading the effort, which represents dozens of states. The Trump administration is hunting for ways to block the ability of states to regulate artificial intelligence. In response, dozens of state attorneys general have now sent a letter pressing Congressional leadership not to approve language that would preempt their governments’ freedom to propose their own legislation on the technology....

item.title: Suno AI Rep Turns the Internet Against Suno AI With One Simple Post
item.description: Finally, someone is making singing affordable.

item.title: Rising unemployment rate for Black women sparks calls for change
item.description: The unemployment rate for Black women increased from 6.7% to 7.5% between August and September this year. In a packed room at a library in downtown Boston, Rep. Ayanna Pressley posed a blunt question: Why are Black women, who have some of the highest labor force participation rates in the country, now seeing their unemployment rise faster than most other groups?...

item.title: The Core i7-14650HX inside this $480 Windows 11 PC is way faster than Apple's $1399 Mac mini M4 Pro CPU and it's my Black Friday PC bargain pick
item.description: Abytespark Tower Business Desktop is just $480 for Black Friday and its Core i7-14650HX CPU is far faster than Apple’s $1,399 Mac Mini M4 Pro.

item.title: Find Your Grind raises $5M to grow platform empowering students to explore unique career paths
item.description: Nick Gross says that Find Your Grind gives students the tools to explore what careers are out there and what paths suit their strengths, interests, and visions for what they want their futures to look like.

item.title: Score Apple TV+ for over 50% off for Black Friday
item.description: The Apple TV+ Black Friday deal is live. New and returning subscribers can enjoy six months for $5.99 per month and save $42.

item.title: Alienware Aurora Gaming Desktop Review: Great Value
item.description: With a loop of light on the front and great overall value, this Alienware prebuilt gaming PC is an easy way into desktop gaming.
